metadata.name: PB Bankshares Inc. Common Stock
metadata.description: PB Bankshares, Inc. focuses on operating as a holding company for the Presence Bank that provides various financial products and services in Pennsylvania. The company accepts various deposits, including demand deposit accounts, savings accounts, money market accounts, and certificate of deposit accounts. It also provides one- to four-family residential real estate, commercial real estate, commercial and industrial, construction, and consumer loans, as well as home equity lines of credit. In addition, the company offers remote deposit capture, commercial cash management, and mobile deposits, as well as online and mobile banking services; and invests in various securities. It operates through a network of three branch offices and two loan production office in Chester, Lancaster, and Dauphin Counties, Pennsylvania. PB Bankshares, Inc. was founded in 1919 and is based in Coatesville, Pennsylvania.
